text: nope! Brozened means you've eaten enough to feel sated, plorped means you've eaten so much you can't move. Jawmuncher is a particularly crunchy pear, as opposed to the more juicy slatherchops. Slogger is a pie, which is quite different to the Mancunian growler
author: IsabelHardman

text: Both the Tory defectors and the Labour defectors say their values haven’t changed but their parties have. Logically this means the Independent Group is starting out with a big split on policy, even if its members haven’t recognised that yet
author: IsabelHardman

text: Heidi Allen kicks off the defection press conference with jokes and a v upbeat tone. Couldn’t be more different to the sorrowful atmosphere from the ex-Labour seven on Monday.

text: yes! So much pressure plus also it's a way of commoditising the relationship and making it about what other people see rather than the loveliness of privacy. See also 'The Boy', which suggests relationships are just about bagging someone and ticking a box to say you're not alone.
